headerDisplay: To create Sleepme API keys, set up a developer account [here](https://docs.developer.sleep.me/docs/)

water_level_type.title: Low Water Level Alert Type
water_level_type.description: Select the alert device type for low water level.

active_polling_interval_seconds.title: Active Device Polling Interval (Seconds)
active_polling_interval_seconds.description: Set the interval (in seconds) for polling when device is active/on. Default: 45 seconds

standby_polling_interval_minutes.title: Standby Device Polling Interval (Minutes)
standby_polling_interval_minutes.description: Set the interval (in minutes) for polling when device is in standby/off. Default: 15 minutes
